data.name: Voxel Battle Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Voxel Battle Simulator is a voxel-based tactical game.
Deploy your units on the battlefield and watch as the struggle unfolds in this simple and humorous, voxel-based tactical game. Featuring 90 levels of a single player campaign spread across 6 different world environments. Pit units against each other in the sandbox mode and see which army comes out on top once everything turns to rubble.




  • Strategize the flow of battle
  • Deploy the units
  • Observe the battle unfold
  • Destroy environment
  • Compete with your friends in a local multiplayer




Can you overcome all the challenges throughout different environments, adapt upon seeing different enemy strategies and fulfill the expectations of the general. Unlock new units and upgrade existing ones.



Fully customize and plan your own battles. Fight against your friends in a local PvP mode. Play on 90 maps with a bunch of silly units.

data.short_description: Here is a battle simulator like no other. It’s made of SILLY VOXELS. Experience massive and wacky battles. Play on 90 maps in 6 different environments. Use infantry, tanks, rockets and more…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-785K
  • Memory: 8 RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit system required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
